amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds from being used by the Food and Drug Administration to finalize, implement, or enforce the draft standard memorandum of understanding made available for public comment on February 19, 2015, entitled "Draft Memorandum of Understanding Addressing Certain Distributions of Compounded Human Drug Products Between the State of [Insert State] and the U.S. Food and Drug Administration.".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in House Report 115-295 to prohibit funds from being used by the Food and Drug Administration to finalize, implement, or enforce the draft standard memorandum of understanding made available for public comment on February 19, 2015, entitled "Draft Memorandum of Understanding Addressing Certain Distributions of Compounded Human Drug Products Between the State of [Insert State] and the U.S. Food and Drug Administration.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Carter (GA) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 141 - 279 (Roll no. 446).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Carter (GA) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 141 - 279 (Roll no. 446).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Carter (GA).
